Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselTweaks
Punchline: A collection of quality of life tweaks.
Changelog:
HaselTweaks

- Changed: Dropped the SVG rendering library and replaced the logo in the settings with a simple PNG image. Making it scaleable with the UI was a nice thought, but in the end it just wasn't worth it.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: LeveHelper
Description: A little helper to check which Levequests have been completed and which are missing.
Changelog:
- Changed: The Levemete column is now the issuer instead of the client, as it should be. This makes it easier to figure out where to accept the leves.
  - *Note:* The game sheets don't contain any information about the issuer of a leve. This is server-side only and the reason why I used the leve client instead. Now I added issuer information based on data from the Gamer Escape wiki and will have to update the list with each expansion. Ô∏è  
  If you encounter any problems, please report them. I don't use the plugin much myself at the moment.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: MogMogCheck
Description:
MogMogCheck is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Moogle Treasure Trove event (called Mog Mog Kollektion in German, hence the name).

The Rewards tab lists items of the "Newest ... Tomestone Exchange" shop with their collection status and price.  
You can also check the boxes to keep track of how many Tomestones you need at the top.

The Duties tab lists all the duties that reward Tomestones for the event.  
Clicking on a duty will open the Duty Finder with that duty selected.
Punchline: Tracking assistant for Moogle Treasure Trove rewards
